name: Companion Shadows of Brimstone
description:
Companion for Shadows of Brimstone is a utility application for Flying Frog Production's wonderful game "Shadows of Brimstone". Tracking one or more characters in a campaign mode has never been so easy as this. Simply store your hero's information and leave the pen and paper for an era gone.

Easily store your hero's:
* Stats, Levels, and XP
* Sidebag Tokens
* Items and their upgrades
* Take pictures of gear cards for quick setup
* Abilities
* Injuries and Mutations

Quick and easy character sheets at your fingertips!
